text.description: The text of the motivational quote.

MentalHealthCategory.title: MentalHealthCategory
MentalHealthCategory.description: Represents a category of mental health issues (e.g., Depression, Anxiety).

name.description: The name of the mental health category (e.g., Depression).

description.description: A short description of the mental health issue.

UserProgress.title: UserProgress
UserProgress.description: Represents a user's logged progress data.

date.description: The date the progress was logged.

stress.description: User's stress level for the day (e.g., on a scale of 1-10).

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

favoriteQuotes.description: A list of favorited quote objects.

/quotes/{quoteId}.description: Stores motivational quotes available to all users.

/mental_health_categories/{categoryId}.description: Stores mental health categories available to all users.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profiles. Accessible only by the user (request.auth.uid == userId).

/users/{userId}/progress/{progressId}.description: Stores user progress data. Accessible only by the user (request.auth.uid == userId).
